properties.description: Pipeline em desenvolvimento com informações de titulos a pagar.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select obter_nome_estab(t.cd_estabelecimento) as estabelecimento,
       t.cd_cgc,
       obter_razao_social(t.cd_cgc) as nm_razaosocial,
       obter_nome_fantasia_pj(t.cd_cgc) nm_fantasia,
       t.nr_titulo,
       t.nr_seq_nota_fiscal,
       t.dt_emissao,
       t.dt_vencimento_original,
       t.dt_vencimento_atual,
       t.vl_titulo,
       t.vl_saldo_titulo,
       t.vl_saldo_juros,
       t.vl_saldo_multa,
       t.vl_dia_antecipacao,
       t.vl_bordero,
       t.vl_juros_bordero,
       t.vl_multa_bordero,
       t.vl_desconto_bordero,
       t.vl_ir,
       t.vl_imposto_munic,
       t.vl_inss,
       t.vl_out_desp_bordero,
       t.vl_titulo_estrang,
       t.vl_cotacao,
       obter_valor_dominio(501,t.ie_situacao) as situacao
from titulo_pagar t

properties.description:
Alimenta as informações das tabelas:

Atendimento_ Unidade 
Agendamento_Unidade
Usuarios_Unidade
Consultas_Unidade
Agendas Unidade

Para extração de relatórios do call center.

source.sqlReaderQuery: EXEC sp_getAzureAtendimentos 730

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA,
'Smart DH Itabuna' as BASE
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'Dayhorc ITB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'13188370000146' as CNPJ,
'DH' as MARCA,
'Smart DH Itabuna' as BASE
from usr

SELECT
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'Dayhorc ITB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'13188370000146' as CNPJ,
'DH' AS MARCA,
'Smart DH Itabuna' as BASE
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO,
'Smart DH Itabuna' as BASE
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

properties.description: Pipeline desenvolvido para extração de informações de produção medica das unidades com o sistema Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
        'Oftalmoclin' as BASE
        ,EMP_CGC as CNPJ
        ,gcc.gcc_descr as MARCA
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO --duvida
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIFICACAO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS,
        0 as NR_SEQ_PROC_INTERNO
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (smm_osm_serie = osm_serie and smm_osm = osm_num)
        inner join str str_osm on (str_osm.str_cod = osm_str)
        inner join str str_emp on (str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod)
        inner join pac on (pac_reg = osm_pac)
        inner join cnv on (cnv_cod = osm_cnv)
        inner join psv psv_exe on (psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join psv psv_req on (psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join smk on (smk_cod = smm_cod and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod)
        inner join ctf on (ctf_cod = smk_ctf and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo)
        
        inner join emp ON (emp_cod = str_emp.str_emp_cod)
        inner join gcc ON (gcc_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod)

        left outer join tab on (tab_cod = smm_tab_cod)
        
    where 
        1 = 1
        and convert(varchar(10), osm_dthr, 103) = convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 103)
and osm_dthr between GETDATE() - 730 and GETDATE()

select cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO, cnv.cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO, gcc.gcc_cod AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO, emp.emp_cgc AS CNPJ
from cnv,
     gcc,
     str,
     emp
where gcc.gcc_str_cod = str_cod
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod
and emp_cgc <> '-'
and cnv_cod <> '999'
and cnv_stat = 'A'

SELECT STR_COD AS CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
STR_NOME AS DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
EMP_CGC AS CNPJ
FROM STR, EMP
WHERE STR_EMP_COD = EMP_COD
AND EMP_CGC <> '-'
AND STR_COD <> '999'

properties.description: Execução de pipeline para atualização das informações dos indicadores de Call Center

pipelineReference.referenceName: Cirurgias e Exames Sadalla e HOB

properties.description:
Alimenta as informações das tabelas:

Atendimento_ Unidade 
Agendamento_Unidade
Usuarios_Unidade
Consultas_Unidade
Agendas Unidade

Para extração de relatórios do call center.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT  pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO,
'Smart IOF' as BASE
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA,
'Smart IOF' as BASE
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1

AND AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'IOF' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'40514432000135' as CNPJ,
'IOF' as MARCA,
'Smart IOF' as BASE
from usr

SELECT
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'IOF' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'40514432000135' as CNPJ,
'IOF' AS MARCA,
'Smart IOF' as BASE
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO,
'Smart IOF' as BASE
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

properties.description: Pipeline desenvolvido para extração de informações de produção medica das unidades com o sistema Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
        'Smart Itaigara' as BASE
        ,EMP_CGC as CNPJ
        ,gcc_descr as MARCA
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO --duvida
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIFICACAO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS,
        0 as NR_SEQ_PROC_INTERNO
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (smm_osm_serie = osm_serie and smm_osm = osm_num)
        inner join str str_osm on (str_osm.str_cod = osm_str)
        inner join str str_emp on (str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod)
        inner join pac on (pac_reg = osm_pac)inner join cnv on (cnv_cod = osm_cnv)
        inner join psv psv_exe on (psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join psv psv_req on (psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join smk on (smk_cod = smm_cod and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod)
        inner join gcc on (str_emp.str_cod = gcc_cod)
        
        inner join emp ON (emp_cod = str_emp.str_emp_cod)

        inner join ctf on (ctf_cod = smk_ctf and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo)
        left outer join tab on (tab_cod = smm_tab_cod)
    where 
        1 = 1
        and convert(varchar(10), osm_dthr, 103) = convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 103)
and osm_dthr between GETDATE() - 730 and GETDATE()

select cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO, cnv.cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO, gcc.gcc_cod AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO, emp.emp_cgc AS CNPJ
from cnv,
     gcc,
     str,
     emp
where gcc.gcc_str_cod = str_cod
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod
and emp_cgc <> '-'
and cnv_cod <> '999'
and cnv_stat = 'A'

SELECT STR_COD AS CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
STR_NOME AS DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
EMP_CGC AS CNPJ
FROM STR, EMP
WHERE STR_EMP_COD = EMP_COD
AND EMP_CGC <> '-'
AND STR_COD <> '999'

properties.description:
Alimenta as informações das tabelas:

Atendimento_ Unidade 
Agendamento_Unidade
Usuarios_Unidade
Consultas_Unidade
Agendas Unidade

Para extração de relatórios do call center.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT pac_reg AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    , convert(CHAR(10), osm_dthr, 121) AS DT_ENTRADA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), osm_dthr, 114),8) AS HR_ENTRADA
    , smm_med AS NM_MEDICO
    , osm_cnv AS CD_CONVENIO
    , cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO
    , convert(VARCHAR, (convert(VARCHAR, osm_serie) + convert(VARCHAR, osm_num))) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS DS_UNIDADE
    , emp_nome_fantasia AS MARCA
    , 0 AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , 'NAO ENCONTRADO' AS ID
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(osm_dthr)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(osm_dthr)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(osm_dthr)) AS ANO,
'Smart INOB' as BASE
FROM osm
INNER JOIN smm
    ON smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
        AND smm_osm = osm_num
INNER JOIN pac
    ON pac_reg = osm_pac
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON osm_cnv = cnv_cod
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = osm_str
INNER JOIN psv
    ON psv_cod = osm_mreq
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str.str_str_cod = str_e.str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON str_e.str_emp_cod = emp_cod
WHERE 1 = 1
    AND (
        smm_pacote IS NULL
        OR (smm_pacote = 'C')
        )
    AND smm_sfat NOT IN ('C')

AND osm_dthr BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT AGM_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , agm.agm_cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , CONVERT(DATE, AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA
    , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), agm_hini, 114), 8) AS HORA_AGENDA
    , CASE AGM_ATEND
        WHEN 'CRG'
            THEN 'Cirurgia'
        WHEN 'ASS'
            THEN 'Consulta'
        when '' then 'Consulta'
        ELSE 'Outros'
        END AS TIPO_AGENDA
    , pac.PAC_NOME AS NM_PACIENTE
    , smk.smk_nome AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINC
    , ' ' DS_PROCEDIMENTO_ADIC
    , 1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE
    , USR_NOME AS NM_USUARIO
    , psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS DS_UNIDADE
    , EMP_NOME_FANTASIA AS MARCA
    , CASE 
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A'
            THEN 'Aberta'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E'
            THEN 'Executada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C'
            THEN 'Cancelada'
        WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B'
            THEN 'Bloqueada'
        END STATUS_AGENDA
    , CONVERT(VARCHAR, convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(VARCHAR, AGM_OSM_NUM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO
    , AGM_num AS NR_SEQUENCIA
    , '' ID
    , '' AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm_proc AS DS_PROCEDENCIA
    , agm.AGM_DTMRC AS DT_AGENDAMENTO
    , CONVERT(INT, DAY(AGM_HINI)) AS DIA
    , CONVERT(INT, MONTH(AGM_HINI)) AS MES
    , CONVERT(INT, YEAR(AGM_HINI)) AS ANO
    , ' ' DS_CLASSIFICACAO
    , ' ' DS_AGRUPAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD AS CD_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO AS DS_MOTIVO_CANCELAMENTO
    , agm_med AS CD_AGENDA,
'Smart INOB' as BASE
FROM agm
INNER JOIN usr
    ON (agm.agm_usr_login = usr.usr_login)
INNER JOIN psv
    ON (psv.psv_cod = agm.agm_med)
INNER JOIN smk
    ON (
            agm_smk = smk_cod
            AND agm_tpsmk = smk_tipo
            )
INNER JOIN pac
    ON (pac_reg = agm_pac)
INNER JOIN loc
    ON (AGM_LOC = LOC_COD)
INNER JOIN str
    ON (LOC_STR = STR.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN str str_e
    ON (STR.STR_STR_COD = STR_E.STR_COD)
INNER JOIN cnv
    ON (CNV_COD = AGM_CNV_COD)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ctf ct1
    ON (
            ct1.ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            AND ct1.ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
            )
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

WHERE AGM_DTMRC BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

select 
usr_login as NM_USUARIO,
usr_nome as DS_USUARIO,
usr_status as IE_SITUACAO,
usr_dt_alter_senha as DT_ATUALIZACAO,
'INOB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'00363702000130' as CNPJ,
'INOB' as MARCA,
'Smart INOB' as BASE
from usr

SELECT 
RCL_SMM AS NR_SEQUENCIA,
CONVERT(DATE,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL) AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_DTHR_ATUAL,108) as HR_ATUALIZACAO,

CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM_SERIE) + CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_OSM)) AS NR_ATENDIMENTO, 

RCL_MED AS CD_MEDICO,
PSV_APEL AS NM_MEDICO,
'' AS DS_RETORNO,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_LAUDO_RTF) AS DS_CONDUTA,
RCL_PAC AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
CONVERT(VARCHAR,RCL_TXT) AS DS_DIAGNOSTICO,
'INOB' AS DS_UNIDADE,
'00363702000130' as CNPJ,
'INOB' AS MARCA,
'Smart INOB' as BASE
FROM RCL
INNER JOIN PSV ON PSV_COD = RCL_MED

WHERE RCL_DTHR_ATUAL BETWEEN GETDATE() - 730 AND GETDATE()

SELECT distinct agd_med AS CD_AGENDA 
    , 0 AS DS_AGENDA
    , 0 CD_TIPO_AGENDA
    , psv_cod AS CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    , emp_cgc AS CNPJ
    , '' AS DS_AREA_ATUACAO
    , 'A' AS IE_SITUACAO,
'Smart INOB' as BASE
    -- , CASE 
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS not NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_reconstr
    --     WHEN (agd_dt_reconstr IS NULL and AGD_DT_GERA is not null)
    --         THEN agd_dt_gera
    --     ELSE AGD_DT_GERA
    --     END AS DT_ATUALIZACAO
FROM agd
INNER JOIN PSV
    ON agd_med = psv_cod
INNER JOIN loc
    ON loc_cod = agd_loc
INNER JOIN str
    ON str_cod = loc_str
LEFT OUTER JOIN str str_e
    ON str_e.str_cod = str.str_str_cod
LEFT OUTER JOIN emp
    ON emp_cod = str_e.str_emp_cod

properties.description: Pipeline desenvolvido para extração de informações de produção medica das unidades com o sistema Tasy e Smart.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
        'Smart Itabuna' as BASE
        ,EMP_CGC as CNPJ
        ,gcc_descr as MARCA
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO --duvida
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIFICACAO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS,
        0 as NR_SEQ_PROC_INTERNO
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (smm_osm_serie = osm_serie and smm_osm = osm_num)
        inner join str str_osm on (str_osm.str_cod = osm_str)
        inner join str str_emp on (str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod)
        inner join pac on (pac_reg = osm_pac)inner join cnv on (cnv_cod = osm_cnv)
        inner join psv psv_exe on (psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join psv psv_req on (psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join smk on (smk_cod = smm_cod and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod)
        inner join gcc on (str_emp.str_cod = gcc_cod)
        
        inner join emp ON (emp_cod = str_emp.str_emp_cod)

        inner join ctf on (ctf_cod = smk_ctf and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo)
        left outer join tab on (tab_cod = smm_tab_cod)
    where 
        1 = 1
        and convert(varchar(10), osm_dthr, 103) = convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 103)
and osm_dthr between GETDATE() - 730 and GETDATE()

select cnv_cod AS CD_CONVENIO, cnv.cnv_nome AS DS_CONVENIO, gcc.gcc_cod AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO, emp.emp_cgc AS CNPJ
from cnv,
     gcc,
     str,
     emp
where gcc.gcc_str_cod = str_cod
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod
and emp_cgc <> '-'
and cnv_cod <> '999'
and cnv_stat = 'A'

SELECT STR_COD AS CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
STR_NOME AS DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO, 
EMP_CGC AS CNPJ
FROM STR, EMP
WHERE STR_EMP_COD = EMP_COD
AND EMP_CGC <> '-'
AND STR_COD <> '999'
